thread.title: Well-located, quaint hotel
thread.title_full: Well-located, quaint hotel - Review of L'Empire Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: amt1206
title: Well-located, quaint hotel
text: We stayed in this hotel in July of 2013 and have fond memories of our first trip to Paris. Location was most important to us and this hotel is definitely in the heart of the action. 2 blocks from the Metro and within walking distance to most tourist attractions, this hotel was a perfect jumping off point for our first trip. The rooms are a bit cramped, but certainly adequate, especially for Parisian standards. Recommend!
